website_summaries.verdict: Mixes shock absorption with a really thin design that offers a good grip, all at a low price point.
pros: Cover has a nice level of texture with a 3D geometric design that helps with grip
Slim case that doesn't add much bulk to the smartphone
Reinforced corners to help protect against drops
Raised lip around the screen and camera for protection
cons: Materials in the case are too thin to protect against drops from a height

customer_reviews.title: Awesome design and a solid case
customer_reviews.text: The case is solid and give you a good grip on the phone with the rubbery feel from the edges. I just love the hive design that is on the back of the phone and if you have a black phone it would look 10x better.
customer_reviews.author: Han N

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, sleek and protective
customer_reviews.text: I used several different cases from different brands on my iPhone 6 so when I upgraded to an iPhone 7, I already knew what brand case I wanted. I've been impressed by the cases from Caseology. They're stylish and fun but also offer a higher level of safety while not being a huge, bulky waterproof box. Not surprisingly, I love this case. It's pretty. It's sleek and yet it offers some protections against life's bumps and bruises. It is textured but still slides easily into my pocket. I will probably always use Caseology cases for my phones.
customer_reviews.author: Utah Mom

customer_reviews.title: Had it for a week now so far so good, it’s double layered around all corners to prevent ...
customer_reviews.text: Update: Had it for over a month now so far so good, it’s double layered around all corners to prevent dropping damages ( can’t blame a Case not good because the phone drops face down without a screen protector, just my opinion. I dropped once recently and this has totally saved it ) Since the back camera is unleveled so extra protection is very helpful, the higher frount bumper around all edges helps protects the screen, all cutting areas are perfect well constructed. Very happy with it, Love the color thank you Caseology
customer_reviews.author: FAYE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sophisticated.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough great things about this case. It is sleek and classy. I've had it on my iPhone 8+ for two weeks and absolutely love it. The buttons, camera, and charging area work great with zero issues. There is just enough lip on it that the screen doesn't get touched when the phone is facing downward. The pseudo-metal looking part is just beautiful. I would venture to say it's more beautiful in person than the pictures. The case does have a slight texture to it (the ripples in the picture) and that has not affected my pop socket from sticking at all. I was worried about that, and it turned out to be a non-issue.
customer_reviews.author: LACbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a very loyal Otterbox customer. I took a gamble with this brand based on the good reviews and am happy I gave it a try. The case has protected my phone from several drops (from about 4 feet or so). The case didn’t break from any of these drops either. It’s slimmer than the Otterbox Commuter series. It’s not very grippy though and will slide off a slightly angeled plastic surface. The color is absolutely fantastic, I couldn’t be happier. The colors haven’t faded and the texture on the back looks great. I put a popsocket on and haven’t had any problems with it not sticking or staying on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this case, but is it fake?
customer_reviews.text: This is my second case of this type for my iPhone 7+. The first lasted about a year and a half, which is respectable in this price range. Only the small plastic piece broke off the bottom, the case is actually still usable, but I got another one anyway. Now the new one has completely different typeface and slightly different logo. Did they change or is one a fake? The all caps version is a year and a half old. See pics...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time owning a iPhone that was Plus-sized (got the iPhone 8 Plus) and therefore was looking for a cover that was not only thin to fit comfortably in my tiny hands, but also durable enough to stand any possible drops. Going off of the reviews for this product, I have to say, I love it! I admit, I'm usually not a type of woman that goes for anything that is "pink-ish" but this was such a nice coral color that I surprised myself at how much I enjoy the color. It fits perfectly into the phone and it feels very secure as well. I would definitely consider buying from this brand any day!
customer_reviews.author: Maria S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: The color of this phone case is more accurate. The rose gold is spot on, although the burgundy is more purple than red, I really like the look of it. It fits well on the case and a magnet fits nicely inside of it for my car dashboard. The case feels sturdy, yet flexible and seems like a good option for my phone. I like the feel of the octagon texture on the back, but the case does seem to be a little slippery. Overall, I’m pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Okay so far
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to give this case a try after reviews for my usual Spigen case wasn’t so great for IPhone 8 Plus. So far, I like the car in that it has a semi hard outside cover with a rubber inside to absorb impacts. The backside of the case is “stylish” but unfortunately...rather slick to the touch. This makes it easy to drop without a good grip or slide off things I place the phone on. For the price, I’m happy with it...but wish it had better grip.
customer_reviews.author: SJC

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and sleek
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone case. This is actually the second time I’ve purchased this case. I had my old case for two years and had dropped my phone so, so many times. Because of the raised edges, it always protected my screen when it fell face down. The case was so banged up when I decided to get a new one and yet no damage to my phone itself. This goes to show how durable the case is. When I decided to get a new phone case, I looked around but had to get this one again because I loved it so much. I knew it was high quality, professional looking, and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lapinski

customer_reviews.title: Honestly always the best cases. We have been purchasing Caseology cases for ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly always the best cases. We have been purchasing Caseology cases for years after we decided Otterbox was too bulky and expensive. Their cases sacrifice no protection but are incredibly affordable. The cases has sustained more drops than I can count and none of our phones have ever sustained damage. A brand I trust. We don’t ever choose another. This one has a slightly less snug fit than the Skyfall series, but still fits well and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and nice design!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Caseology phone case. I had one for the iPhone 7, and my second one on my 8plus. I think they are very sturdy, The 2nd one broke on the bottom but after a few year's use and for the price I'm content and I have my slim phone. I drop my phone very often and it has protected my phone well, the only thing that has broken is the screen protector. This is a different design and I am very pleased with how it looks, it's less slippery than the one with the plastic back and everything fits perfect. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It is sleek, stylish, and protects my phone very well; however, I keep having the same problem with the plastic border near the volume buttons breaking. I would like for it to be sturdier there or have the option to purchase just the plastic border. This is my 5th purchase of this case in the last few years, but I will have to find another one if I keep having this issue. Other than that, very well-made product.
customer_reviews.author: Lawsro

customer_reviews.title: Burgundy is brown
customer_reviews.text: Burgundy looks very brown :(. That is my ONLY complaint. I have had great luck with Caseology cases and this one fits perfect. Looks great and fits great. I am returning mine only because the color is not what I ordered but will buy a different color! I have had two of these cases on my old 6s and my old phone looks great. I have a very handsie 17 month old. It has been dropped multiple times and survived no issues! I had one case completely break but my phone survived perfectly. It made me a believer and now all I buy are caseology.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: This is my second caseology case and I'm disappointed with how slippery it is
customer_reviews.text: This is my second caseology case and I'm disappointed with how slippery it is. Literally within minutes it slipped out of my hands twice, almost like a bar of soap. I ended up keeping it because it does look nice and once you remind yourself not to hold it on the sides but the back (which has some texture to it) its remained safe.
customer_reviews.author: Don Kronos

customer_reviews.title: This cover is just okay for the price paid
customer_reviews.text: I earlier wrote an awesome review but a few days later, I could see that the cover front edge has some weird scratchy thing happening. I wouldn't have noticed it If it wouldn't have scratched me. My say for this is its a good protecting cover but will probably last for 6 months approx. However, for me, it's not worth the price I paid. I contacted the seller as well. But their reply was its a normal wear and tear. Therefore, I am buying a new one but mostly from other sellers. I hope this review could help you in understanding the product.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Got sent the wrong size!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one for iPhone 7 Plus. I got one for the iPhone 7. Doesn't fit. Darn. It had such great potential too, and now I can't find this color anymore. What a shame. I like Caseology (owned by Spigen) since I have a Spigen Slim Armor CS for the iPhone 6. It's almost 6 years old and is still kicking just fine. By looking at the Caseology Parallax, it seems to be durable enough for at-home carpet drops. I can't say the same for the shiny polycarbonate. It looks so think and delicate! I think the purpose of the case is to prevent you from dropping it, but once you do, you're on your own!
customer_reviews.author: CrunchyJeans

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this case because of its excellent reviews. While it is indeed a beautiful case I'm disappointed to say that after just one year of very careful use the gold trim actually broke on the left hand side, right where the word "caseology" is imprinted. I must have happened when my phone fell accidentally in our house. I surely would have expected the case to withstand such a fall.
customer_reviews.author: Makiki90

customer_reviews.title: Slim, Lightweight, Durable.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this case for four months now, and cannot say enough good things about it. It is light weight, slides in and out of my pocket easily, and does not add too much bulk to my phone. I have used the more expensive, larger cases and always felt bogged down by them. h This case allows for easy use of my phone. Lets face it, we all have paid big bucks for a slim, lightweight phone, so why buy a large bulky case to protect it? There is no reason to, especially with this affordable product on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Huntley

customer_reviews.title: No grip whatsoever and color was way off
customer_reviews.text: First, it isn't burgundy at all- it's a dark brown or really dark purple. There's no red to it. Also, I was under the assumption that the word "grip" in the title and description indicated that the backing was rubberized, had some grip to it, and wouldn't slide around. I was definitely wrong on that. It's slipping and sliding everywhere. Overall, I'm not a fan and will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how it guard my phone against a falls for I have yet to drop it. But the design is nice and overall grip and function of buttons. I wasn't sure the case fit at first considering I had a hard time getting my phone inside the case, but everything lines up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Is a Great Case
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case. It is good looking, and most importantly, easy to hold. My phone did not slip out of my hands very often. I didn't realize how good this case was for that until just now. I got a new phone and a new case, and the case is so slippery I have to return it. I will probably just get the Parallax for the 11 Pro Max now. I had a good run with my 7 Plus and this case. :)
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Classy mint
customer_reviews.text: I'm so enjoying this case. I bought it to match my silver phone. Choices for silver are limited but this case has caused me to appreciate & fall in love with my phone. Grip is nice and color is so cute. I've received many compliments on this case. If it wasn't mint, my case would've been white. One glitch, my case is starting to show a dirty look along the very edges. Thusly I'm prepared to buy a 2nd for the price in case cleaning doesn't work. I feel that the case is priced well and for the amount of use, this case is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony

customer_reviews.title: A Year and a half later, Still Looks New
customer_reviews.text: I'm very cautious with my belongings. I rarely ever drop my phone. So I really wasn't in need for a full on hardcore protective case. After reviewing many cases in higher price ranges, I decided to try this one, as the sleek yet professional style and apparent durability and design fit what I was looking for. A year and a half later, the case remains in great shape. My phone is intact, despite a couple of drops, even on corners, and the case doesn't look like its taken a beating. The case fits the phone snug, and is simple to clean. It's somewhat flexible but sturdy. For the price, I think this case is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: B.Z.

customer_reviews.title: My most favorite cases that are made!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because it is just like the one on my iPhone 6 and I loved it. I have always preferred the Caseology cases since I purchased my first one after see them on Shark Tank many years ago. They are without a doubt the best case made in my opinion. I had brought a Otterbox years ago and the plastic around the face cracked and broke off for no reason. I don’t really never one of those anyway because I am careful with my phone. I will only buy Caseology ever.
customer_reviews.author: Nana52

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, feels great and protects great, too!
customer_reviews.text: The Caseology case looks gorgeous really cool and fits perfectly on my iPhone 8+. Has a really nice feel overall and comfortable to hold. Survived being dropped on my bathroom tile floor numerous times without ANY damage. Even though the edges of the case seem kind of hard to me, compare to the Tech21 case I had on my iPhone 6, it is one tough case I feel confident about it protecting my iPhone long term. Definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: TwoTees

customer_reviews.title: Best case I've had and I drop my phone all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Second time I've gotten this case and I still love it! Call me fumbles because I drop my phone all the time and every time I drop it I go this is the time my screen is cracked but nope, this case always saves the day and im talking about dropping it while walking on the sidewalk, asphalt, you name it. Had to get a new one after a year due to wear and tear on but the actual case never broke apart, stretched, or had any issues what so ever. The wear and tear was more so the paint job just being scratched from me dropping my phone throughout the year.
customer_reviews.author: AznMikeD

customer_reviews.title: Caseology did a great job in creating something that in itself is a stunning design, and protects my iPhone 7 Plus
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this case. The design on the back actually helps grip the iPhone so that it does not slide out of your hand. It is very easy to snap the case on your phone, and the buttons work just like if there was no case at all! Highly recommended - I think Caseology did a great job in creating something that in itself is a stunning design, and adds beauty and protection to my iPhone 7 Plus. I hope that you have found my opinion to be helpful with your decision process to purchase this item. If this is the case, and where Amazon asks if this review helpful, please click "yes". Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS COMPANY
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS COMPANY. This is my third case, and the absolute best so far. My last case held up for two and a half years before cracking. I like this case because it has a great grip, and it doesn’t slip out of my hands. It hugs my phone tightly, and truly does protect it from falls (my cats knock my phone over all the time - this case works!). I would definitely recommend pairing the case with a glass shield (I like the onmotion shields). Don’t spend more money on a fancy case - THIS is what you need!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Decent and priced right
customer_reviews.text: Great price and perfect fit. But gold part of case snapped after a using it for a about 4 months. It still works just not as attractive. Delivery was fast, packaging was okay. Two point deduction because it didn't hold up for a year, other than that a great sturdy case that has protected my phone over a couple of drops.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but how tough is it really
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case for my husband, who carries his phone in his pocket and has dropped it maybe 2 or 3 times. The case made it 11 months before the outer plastic frame snapped. Ordered a second one only because he really likes it and insisted. I have another Caseology myself, that has withstood too many drops to count (I drop my phone on concrete outside...a lot). Wish this one was as sturdy as mine.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Gummere

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case that gets everything perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had several cases over several years and phones. Usually they are protective but unwanted but I have to say I actually enjoy this case. The visual design is perfect, the case is not too bulky but protects adequately. The grip and buttons are just right. I will definitely be looking to Caseology for my next phone.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Good looking case, not sure how protective
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought this case by mistake; thought I was buying an Otter Box. (Thought it was a good price!) It's a nice case, two pieces. However, the gold is one piece, and the burgundy is a second piece. It is not two separate pieces to completely cover like the Otter Box. I'm not too sure how this will hold up for a long drop. It is exceptionally pretty! It fits my iPhone 8 plus very well, and keeps it from being too bulky. I'll use it until I find just the right case to fully protect my investment, as these phones are really getting expensive.
customer_reviews.author: SueSee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fix
customer_reviews.text: This case fix good BUT it covers the top part of my camera so I can’t take pictures with it on and buying $21 for this case it shouldn’t do that!! I have bought this case for my other phone twice and this never happened before!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Roesch

customer_reviews.title: Pop Socket won't stay on!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and feel of the case. I read the reviews on this case saying that people could put a Pop Socket on it but, after numerous attempts, I was unable to get a brand new one to stick to the case, due to its texture. I really need a Pop Socket for my 8 Plus because my right hand isn't big enough to reach across the screen when holding it normally. I've only had this case for two days now, and I'm considering returning it to get a new case that is Pop Socket-compatible or engineering a solution to get it to stick (which may involve some duct tape).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really protects your phone
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Caseology case. I was nervous the first time around, because I must drop my phone about 80 times a day, but they really do protect my phone as well as a bulkier Otterbox. I love the sleek and slim design and the color schemes. The grip is great too! I have one more on its way - love changing out the cases often.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: actual colors not true to product images
customer_reviews.text: Product images show bright burgundy body, that very clearly define the depth and design on it, with rose gold frame. The navy one clearly shows a gold frame. I ordered the burgundy one specific for the colors I was seeing and neither were accurate. The burgundy is very dark and you can barely tell there is a pattern, even in light. And the frame is gold, no where near the rose gold that is shown on the images. I'll wait a while before rating the product quality.
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint Magnet
customer_reviews.text: This case truly is a fingerprint magnet...sure it looks beautiful initially but then after a few days the black back looks AWFUL! Scratches also get easily seen on this case throughout daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Dominik

customer_reviews.title: Slim and protective!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Caseology case, and I love it! I drop my phone non-stop, and was worried that the glass screen protector would crack without my full bulky Otterbox case. I was so wrong! It’s held up perfectly through many drops and falls, and not one dent to the screen protector or phone. Very sleek and slim. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: The best cases  for our iPhone’s.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of these cases. I loved mine. Made very well as the one I bought for my husband. He likes his also. The backing it exactly what we needed so our phones no longer was slipping and sliding. Just got a new iPhone 8 Plus and got my case for it today. Looks awesome on my phone. My grandson gets my 6 Plus with its case already on it. Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Andreason

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Simple Case
customer_reviews.text: When I upgraded from an iPhone 6plus to an iPhone 7plus, I needed a simple case that wasn't too expensive and provided basic protection. I've been impressed with the Caseology case in the few weeks I've been using it. It fits the phone snuggly, and provides a smooth surface that gives a bit more holding friction that the polished metal of the phone, which always feels slick. I like that the case has small built in buttons that cover the iPhone's buttons and which function very well unlike some cases where the case just extends over the buttons with little bumpouts that make it harder to press the phone's buttons.
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: This one 'stuck'!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few different I-phone cases until I finally settled on this one. I've been using it for close to a year now. I'd say that I am probably a bit harder on phones than most people so this one was a good compromise between durability, protection and not being too bulky like the otter box style cases. If I need another case I'll probably buy another of these.
customer_reviews.author: M. Galvin

customer_reviews.title: Good case, not super protective
customer_reviews.text: Got this case for my wife. Thought it would protect the edges of the screen a little better, but my wife dropped the phone a few days after getting the case and the screen cracked. Not really the case’s fault, the pictures just make the edges look a little thicker than they actually are. So be aware, it doesn’t provide a whole lot of edge protection. Overall though it’s been a decent case. It’s holding together well and keeps the back from getting scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Braddamon

customer_reviews.title: Great little case!
customer_reviews.text: Love the case, love the style and the design, love the burgundy color, love the feel of the case in my hand. Wishing it was a tad bit thicker to give a bit more real estate/ protection, tho. Haven’t dropped my phone with this case on, as of yet, so cant really review that aspect of the case. I will say that l had the ‘wavelength’ series case on an older phone years ago and loved it and It held up very well!
customer_reviews.author: WhitsRus

customer_reviews.title: Good price; Great thickness
customer_reviews.text: This is the first case I used as soon as I got my iPhone 7 Plus. I ordered it because it was the only decent one that could be delivered as quickly as possible with Prime next-day shipping speed. Hey...sometimes you settle in life, right? But it's been a few months, and I haven't bothered to switch to a new case. Haven't had the need. I've dropped this phone quite a few times, and this case has held up. I like how thin it is. I'm normally annoyed at phone cases and never used one with my iPhone 5S. So this case was a good way to get acclimated to using cases.
customer_reviews.author: Teagan

customer_reviews.title: Not burgundy
customer_reviews.text: The case is classy and feels good in your hand. I didn’t think it was slippery at all. However, if you order burgundy, you will be disappointed as I was. The color is a dark purple. Pretty but definitely not burgundy like description or picture. Disappointed here.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mae

customer_reviews.title: its a keeper.
customer_reviews.text: I like this one, a good thin case that appears will protect the phone pretty well - will it hold up to a drop? dont know and dont plan to find out. One nice feature is a good grip texture that doesn't fell like you will drop the phone and also it covers the screen edges with a good lip if you set the phone down face down like I do at night to keep the screen from waking me up- as good as any ive seen in the stores for a lot less money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bottorff

customer_reviews.title: Caseology Is The Way To Go
customer_reviews.text: I bought the case based on the reviews, figured I give it a shot. Once it arrived, I wasn’t convinced of it’s durability or ergonomics. After I got it onto my I iPhone 8plus, i realized it was the perfect fit. Hugs the frame quite well, rich matte black, and not too bulky unlike other cases. This is the best case I’ve ever purchased, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Survived a fall on the freeway
customer_reviews.text: This case is great. Been using it on my iPhone 8 Plus for 6 months and it has saved it from many drops. The material is durable and provides good everyday protection without being too bulky. Yet, it is thin enough that a magnet will work through to use a magnet mount for the car. Best part - it survived falling off my car at 65 miles per hour on the freeway. It skidded to a stop the side of the road with minimal scratching on the gold accents. I was able to use 'find my iphone' to locate it and retrieve it fully alive on the freeway. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sara W

customer_reviews.title: One of the best looking cases for the iphone 7 plus
customer_reviews.text: One of the best looking cases for the iphone 7 plus. The style and color are great and it fits the case perfectly. My must have for any cases is that the ports are easily accessible, the volume and power buttons feels great, and that there's a slight raise so that the phone isn't touching the surface when faced down. The only downside is that the case is a little too thin and light giving the assumption that it won't really protect your phone if you were to drop it.
customer_reviews.author: Binh Mai

customer_reviews.title: Ok case but terrible caseology is to communicate with if you have problems
customer_reviews.text: Case was ok but has an issue with the case. Caseology refused to help me. So if you have trouble with this case, done expect any help form caseology. You will just receive boilerplate email that solve nothing. This was not an experience I had with amazon but an issue I had with Caseology. This was not amazon fault.
customer_reviews.author: CD costa

customer_reviews.title: ... my phone cover in the mail today & absolutely LOVE the coral color
customer_reviews.text: I just received my phone cover in the mail today & absolutely LOVE the coral color, cover design, and feel of it in my hand. The texted backing gives it a nice grip to hold on to as I tend to have butter fingers and drop my phone a lot. I'm give 4 stars as of now because I don't know how it will hold up to the drops and normal wear/tear but I will update after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney J.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks cool too!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this case, and so far I love it. It is thin, lightweight, and provides good protection for the phone. With the 7 + being bulky already, this makes it very easy to hold on to. Back is rubberized for good grip. And it looks kind of cool too.Good protection for the camera, and the buttons are fully accessible. If anything changes I will update this review, but for now, I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: kaydaynow

customer_reviews.title: Broken phone
customer_reviews.text: I researched a lot for drop tested phone cases and was excited to find a slim & stylish case that was supposed to protect my phone. The case looks nice but the material is flimsy. My cell fell facedown onto concrete from about 3 feet. It completely shattered and broke off the top left corner of the screen. I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Fits iPhone 7 + Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 9/10/17: I just dropped my phone on the cement! It landed on the corner of the case. The case PROTECTED PERFECTLY! No damage to my phone or screen at all. Only scratched the corner of my case. Super impressed! 8/7/17: Very nice case. Easy to put in but fits snug to my phone. The edges around the screen are smooth so there's not a ledge. Got the black and red and it looks great. Texture is nice. Feels good to hold but not bulky. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: NW Pagan

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. The colors of coral and gold and the hexagonal design are really pretty all together. The case fits perfectly on my iPhone 7 Plus. It has plastic covers over the volume buttons but everything else is open. I have no issues using the Do Not Disturb switch, volume, camera, or charge port on the phone. I can hear music and sound clearly through the speakers on the bottom of my iPhone. All in all, I am very happy with this case and would definitely buy from Caseology again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Great design and really good protection for your phone at a cheap price.
customer_reviews.text: Really good case and cheap. My son dropped my phone a few times and it hit on the corner. Left a little scuff but didn't crack screen or damage phone. I have had butter fingers and dropped it a few times. It leaves marks that are unnoticeable which is nice. They are somewhat resilient in that the next day the dents push back a little bit and become unnoticeable unless you look for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cover!!
customer_reviews.text: I love caseology and they have always outlasted the phones they cover. I have never had to replace my covers, I have several kids who use my phone and it’s been dropped several times with no issues to the phone. (Plus it’s sleek and good looking)
customer_reviews.author: AKmandy

customer_reviews.title: Second Pick, First Class
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this case was not my first pick for my new 7 plus in Jet Black. I initially wanted a case with a clear back, but the one I ordered is backordered until November. So, I went with this one, based on reviews. I find it is quite excellent - slim, low profile, but solid casing with a protective bumper for the front. The grip is excellent and the buttons on each side are flexible, unlike my Sp***en cover for my iPhone 6, which became hardened over the past two years. Like it a lot. Glad I didn't get the other one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Tough
customer_reviews.text: After my last iPhone I decided to only buy cases from Caseology. They are very cute, durable, and hybrid which are now my favorite types of cases. I’ve already dropped my phone numerous times and the case still has no cracks, dents, or scratches. It installs really easy and fast and doesn’t have me feel like my phone has more weight and bulkiness added to it. Also the buttons, camera, speakers and charging port are easy to use and aren’t covered up. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Luv_Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice, but......
customer_reviews.text: First: it’s not truely a duel layer case. The gold part is the plastic part, the blue is some sort of soft silicone or plastic material. I liked my 6s case better because it was solid and felt safer. I worry that the silicon part won’t protect my IPhone 8plus’ glass back. I wish I had know that it wasn’t a solid case. Overall I do like the look though.
customer_reviews.author: Alli A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Another Awesome iPhone 7 Plus case
customer_reviews.text: This is my third different Caseology case purchase. The multiple purchases are not because they wear out or that they are not quality phone cases. Each one I have is different and all still look like new. The texture on this style makes it each to grip your phone in any circumstance. I still love the other two, but it is fun to switch them around for different looks.
customer_reviews.author: K. HOWE

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Although this case protected my phone from cracking. My phone now has several deep gouges and scratches from this phones flimsy lock of protection. I only used this case for a month and my phone looks a couple years old. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany P.

customer_reviews.title: This case saved my phone!
customer_reviews.text: Buy it! I bought the Caseology Parallax about a year ago and my phone is still in great condition despite dropping it quite a few times. But what really makes me want to write this review is that 2 weeks ago I dropped the phone in a parking lot while it was pouring outside and probably 30 degrees. An hour later I found my phone (thanks to the Find my Iphone app), and the phone was working FINE and still is. I'm sure my screen protector helped, but the case is what I believe saved the day. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jpal4037

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good, Feels Good, Plastic breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Great looking case and feels good on the hand. First time putting it on my phone it broke. The area around the camera just cracked. I ended up just pulling off the broker part. I don't know if anybody has had this issue but I was disappointed that I just got this case and it already broke.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Pedroza

customer_reviews.title: Nice case but weak plastic cross piece on the bottom.
customer_reviews.text: I had this product for less than a month and the bottom cross piece broke off in almost a clean break on one side. I had to snap it off the other side to not have the thin piece of plastic dangling... otherwise I like the case. It could fit a little tighter on the phone as I have seen with other brands. Looks nice (sans the missing plastic cross piece on the bottom) and protects the phone well. Perhaps the broken plastic is a fluke with this one unit...
customer_reviews.author: David M Plourde

customer_reviews.title: Not bulky and no seams 😎
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving this case! Highly recommend! I have horrible arthritis in my fingers and this case is easy for me to hold, not slippery and best part is there are no seams (seams are the worst for me, they actually hurt my hands) smooth design and not bulky
customer_reviews.author: Troynteri

customer_reviews.title: MINIMALIST CASE WITH GRIP
customer_reviews.text: Love this case, rubber surrounding PHONE is durable and has held up well to drops, also keeps me from dropping it when: reading news, WALKING ON SIDEWALKS, PHONE IN HAND BUT NOT LOOKING AT IT, BECAUSE PEOPLE WHO DO THAT IN CONGESTED AREAS PROBABLY HAD A PHONE DROP IN THE CARDS, FACE DOWN IN A CAR BC FACE UP THE PHONE SLIDES AROUND, AND MULTIPLE OTHER SCENARIOS
customer_reviews.author: Claig

customer_reviews.title: Phone survived 8 floor fall
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this case for about two years now with minor drops but yesterday this case was put to the test. My son dropped my phone when we were getting on an elevator and my phone fell 8 floors down the elevator shaft. We could see it glowing at the bottom where it landed. I was sure the screen shattered but to my surprise when they retrieved my phone the only damage was scratches to the case and the nick in the case where the impact was. I am buying this same case again right now and they have a lifelong customer.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Balen

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today. It looks good, sure. But the right side outer gold piece is bowed out so it doesn’t fit snug. It’s not a huge deal unless you’re a perfectionist which I am so I dislike the entire thing now and I’m already shopping for something different.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... several different cases from Caseology and have never been disappointed. I have one case that is three years ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several different cases from Caseology and have never been disappointed. I have one case that is three years old and I've put it through the ringer but it's still intact and fitting firmly around the phone. These are my goto cases for all types of phones. I have them on iPhone 5s, 6, 6s, 7, 8, 8 Plus and Samsung Galaxy's from 2 - the news note and 7 edge.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas L.

customer_reviews.title: Like many other reviewers wrote it’s not burgundy
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewers wrote it’s not burgundy. It is a nice case, I like it, I’m using it but I’m slightly disappointed in the color which is why I only gave it four stars. I have no other complaint about it other then it’s not the color in the pictures. I’ve only had it for a week or two so I can’t review how well it stands the test of time. But I do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzybethcoots

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This phone case is perfect! Nice simple design that looks great and offers protection from drops and scrapes. I am most thankful that I was able to get a full refund after I ordered the wrong size! The right size is perfect. Thank you for the fabulous customer service.
customer_reviews.author: I'll Take That!

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this case. I drop my phone all the time and my friends knock it out of my hands - it protects my phone when it hits the ground. I put so much trust in this case that I don't even have a screen protector on it. I get compliments at the meetings I go to or when I'm out and about. It does not slip out of my hands and has a nice touch to it. Doesn't get dirty, but easy to clean if something gets sticky. It is sturdy and compliments my black iPhone. I will only be ordering cases from this brand for now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gold finish peeling off after a month!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I normally love caseology cases. Prior to this one, I had an aqua wavelength series one on my iPhone for 1.5 years - it was dropped quite a few times and still held up. I decided to try a different style and tried this parallax series, thinking maybe it would be easier to keep clean (that was the only downside to the wavelength series) I’ve had this phone case on for just over a month and the gold finish is peeling off. It hasn’t been dropped or anything, it literally just looks like it’s bubbling up in spots and peeling off - I never had this issue with my other case. Highly disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but...
customer_reviews.text: The case looks nice and feels good. The reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because I’m noticing that the case is beginning to get loose from the sides. I think I have taken the case off no more than 2 times since getting it so it shouldn’t be stretched as much as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. I have dropped my phone many times, and it has protected it. I also keep the glass on the front. The case is easy to install. I also ordered a finger strap for the back and it looks very nice and works well. It is very durable as I have had It for a while and it does not look worn, although I am very rough with my phone. I will order a Nother.
customer_reviews.author: cookies & crackers

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I can't even begin to say how pleased I am with this phone case. Not only is it beautiful, but the slight, comfortable texture on the back makes it feel so much safer in hand. I know I'll never buy anything but a case made by Caseology in the future. I am beyond happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone case so much that I’ve boyght it twice. It holds up good. I did drop my phone quite a few times and it protected the phone perfectly. Eventually, after a year or more, the gold color around the edges slowly faded. That’s the only reason I bought a second one. It’s really pretty and I get compliments on the case all the time. Very simple but pretty. It’s very easy to hold on to-Doesn’t feel slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to complain about!
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice to hold. Seems like it’ll hold onto my phone well. Doesn’t seem to have comparable sturdiness to anything like an OtterBox, but for the price, I’m very happy. The back is slightly textured (very shallow indents in the hexagonal shape). I love it. I have a thin magnet that I put in my cases for my car vent magnet holder thing, and it fits fine, no bulge in the case. I hope it holds up well!
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: The rubber backing has a nice texture with added grip
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this case for a couple of months now. It’s really classy, and I get a lot of compliments on it. The rubber backing has a nice texture with added grip. It’s survived several drops on hard surfaces already. The only reason I’m doing a 4 star is because my home button - the only space not covered by either the case or a glass screen protector - shattered. I believe it could have been avoided if the case had just a slightly higher profile and was not completely flush with the screen.
customer_reviews.author: John jettinghoff

customer_reviews.title: This is a good sturdy case and it looks good too
customer_reviews.text: I can’t remeber how many times I’ve dropped my phone and not a scratch or malfunction has happened. This is a good sturdy case and it looks good too! The case did finally crack after me dropping my phone so much, and after 6 months of having this case. But my phone is intact
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Leyva

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case - however...
customer_reviews.text: The case looks good on the phone and appears to offer good protection. It hasn't been put to a test yet. It maintains the slim style of the phone and keeps the rear lenses recessed. I'd say this is a very good case for the price. Six week update. I had originally ordered the Black/Dark blue model. After six weeks the blue trim started turning green. (Minus 1 star.) I ordered a second case that is black on black. That's fine with me since my phone is matte black.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, good design, well made.
customer_reviews.text: I got this case for my girlfriend's iPhone 7 plus. The case fits nicely and snugly. The only reason she approved of this case is because I have something similar on my Samsung Galaxy S8+. She really likes the design on the back and so do I. The bumps and grooves, in my opinion, helps me grip the phone better. I am a big fan of Caseology cases and I own several of them. They have saved my phone from several drops. I believe they are well built and serve their purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Phone screen cracked on the first drop
customer_reviews.text: The case looks great, feels great and I even recommended it to a few friends. However, when I needed it to protect my phone it didn't come through. My screen cracked on the first drop from 2-3 feet off the ground. I specifically purchased this model because of the 'Military-Grade Protection' claim.
customer_reviews.author: AN

customer_reviews.title: It’s A Really Good iPhone Case
customer_reviews.text: I love this attractive iPhone case. I may be a little late writing this review since I purchased this case last February, but I think it actually helps this review because I’ve had time to see if it really holds up, and I can tell you it does! I am always careful when using my iPhone, as a general rule, but naturally, once in a while it gets dropped. I can say that the case is wonderful and protected my phone from any damage. Not to mention it is still looks brand new! I really love this case and would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Elle T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking case
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking case. Great coverage on the phone, all sides are covered and fit nicely around the buttons. Scratches easy as I already have a few scratches though from accidentally bumping it around. The lip around the screen is slightly raised so offers some protection. I recommend a tempered glass screen for extra coverage.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Durable yet minimalist
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It doesn’t add any bulk to the phone yet has a nice lip to protect the screen and the ridges help prevent it from sliding along tables and all that Jazz. I have definitely dropped my phone probably four separate times since I got this case, and a couple of drops would have certainly broken the phone had I not had a case on. There’s no damage whatsoever to my phone or the case which has pleased me greatly. It’s incredibly protective for its minimalist design. I will continue to buy this case for future phones.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Blake

customer_reviews.title: Failed 3 feet drop
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my phone with this case on when trying to get it out of my pocket. As you can see in the picture, it failed to protect the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Le

customer_reviews.title: Great, Durable Case - Just Bought a 2nd One
customer_reviews.text: Just bought my second Parallax by Caseology. First one lasted two years and took a beating. I was pleasantly surprised that given how thin this case was, even though I dropped it several times from hip/counter/car heights, it never once damaged the phone or the screen (added note, I don't use a screen protector either). I got two years of wear and tear out of mine, that was good enough for me to buy another one (bonus, it's cheaper than it was two years ago). Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not protective at all!
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to hold and my teen son likes the slimness of it. Except not protective at all! He has only dropped it once, the case stayed on BUT...I just had to pay $90 to get the screen replaced!!! He still has it on his phone while I search for a durable one!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! It arrived to my home very quickly and had great packaging that kept it safe on its journey. I bought this as one of my mothers stocking stuffers this year, but after looking at this one I’m defiantly getting myself one lol Downside, pop sockets do not secure well on this type of case.
customer_reviews.author: Risa

customer_reviews.title: Looks fine, very thin
customer_reviews.text: Looks fine, very thin, but it was too slippery in the hand and when set down for me. I also prefer the extra screen saver piece to having to stick on a screen protector which inevitably bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: 5plus

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, fits great, very slim
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, fits great, very slim, but did not protect my phone screen protector when the phone was dropped. Perhaps it was not made to protect the screen at all, but that is my reason for 4 stars instead of 5. Make sure and have a screen protector along with this case. We have 3 of these in our family.
customer_reviews.author: dfrjr

customer_reviews.title: Overall the case has been great. PROS
customer_reviews.text: Overall the case has been great. PROS: Great feel - not too slick or sticky Good protection - I've dropped it a couple times with no damage Looks good - unobtrusive addition to the phone rather than a distraction Great cover - looks good with no usage issues CONS: Getting the glass cover on was not easy. The referred-to help shows a box-template which does not come with the case. That would've been much easier, I believe, than the tabs that did come with the case. After several attempts I got the cover on almost exactly centered but bent up an edge on the bottom which mars the overall impression of quality. Overall - Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: George Plumfield

customer_reviews.title: Not for people who constantly drop their phones
customer_reviews.text: I had this case for two weeks and pieces were breaking off from it. Do not buy this case if you drop your phone a lot the plastic parts of the case will fall off and leave you with a tacky looking phone. Would not recommend to anyone who drops their phone every second. Nonetheless, this case is very cute and easy to grip.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone case
customer_reviews.text: This is my second caseology phone case. Durable and lightweight plus it protects your phone. I have dropped my phone so many times and no damage to my phone. This phone case took the brunt of the fall and protected my phone.
customer_reviews.author: melb1114

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer support !!!
customer_reviews.text: At first thought this was a great product. I had this for a 1 1/2 years with no issues until now. I do not abuse my phone and expect that when I purchased this with a "limited life time warranty" that is would last as long as my phone. As you see from the photo it did not . I contacted Caseology customer service and had to jump thru so many loops , sent pictures that they requested twice and still no resolution to this day. I then went and ordered a new phone case from another manufacturer who I know will stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Recchion

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret this purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love my new case! The design is beautiful, the color scheme is very classy and although the case is slim, it feels sturdy in your hands, yet maintains an elegant look. I only ordered a new case because my Caseology Skyfall Series iPhone 8/7 Cover Case with Clear Slim Protective for Apple iPhone 7 (2016)/iPhone 8 (2017) - Rose Gold broke last week (the clear plastic fell out of the backing). This one seems to have a better design and it matches my Apple Watch & band perfectly!! I may be a little OCD about matching my products. Totally worth the buy, even better that it is half off retail price on here! WIN!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M Seal

customer_reviews.title: Less Durability
customer_reviews.text: It's been exactly one year. Loved this protector but it just broke. Happened while I was putting into my pants pocket. Too bad because it looked nice but not quite worth having to get a replacement of the same.
customer_reviews.author: Butch Bouchard

product_meta.title: Caseology Parallax for Apple iPhone 8 Plus Case (2017) / for iPhone 7 Plus Case (2016) - Award Winning Design - Black/Deep Blue
feature_bullets: Best-selling geometric design with textured cover offers a secure non slip grip and increased shock absorption
Protective frame provides additional grip on the sides and durable corner cushion protection against drops
Slim dual layer design combines TPU and PC material into a thin non bulky cover and adds minimal bulk
Responsive button covers with crisp tactile feedback, precise cutouts and raised front lip protection
Caseology Parallax Designed for Apple iPhone 7 Plus Case

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars6,222 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
